text: Gelterfingen was a municipality in the administrative district of Bern- Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Gelterfingen, MÃ¼hledorf and Noflen merged into the municipality of Kirchdorf. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
